uc.compacttopbar.activate: Activate the theme (make sure compact mode is enabled)
uc.compacttopbar.float: Makes the top bar float out from screen edge in compact mode
uc.compacttopbar.glow: Makes the top bar have a glow (based on zen primary color) around it for better visual seperation
uc.compacttopbar.outline: Makes the top bar have a thin outline (based on zen primary color) around it for better visual seperation
uc.compacttopbar.applyToTabBar: Apply glow and outline to Tab navigation side bar as well
